availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry C. Nebel (Harrison County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, hotel keeper. Native of Hanover, Germany. Married to Amelia Nebel. Father of Amelia Nebel, Juliana Nebel, Louisa Nebel, and Maria Nebel. Hotel keeper in Cynthiana, Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1860. Merchant in Harrison County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, Cynthiana, p. 571.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, Cynthiana, p. 179A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Harrison County, KY, June 1863, p. 176.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994037, Harrison County Deaths.
"H. C. Nebel (1827-1906)," Find A Grave, Memorial 167109131, accessed April 14, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/167109131.
